Queen of Kowloon is a 2000 Hong Kong film directed by Clarence Fok.
Tsang Tsou Choi, nicknamed the "King of Kowloon", made an appearance in the film.
Cast
* Suki Kwan
* Deanie Ip
* Wayne Lai
* Kwan Hoi-san
* Teresa Ha
* Lau Kong
* Helena Ma Hoi Lun
* Hui Fan
* Fung Wai Hang
* Debbie Tam Kit Man
* Tang Wing San
